title: FS: Lot of Low Grade T206 w/HOF'ers and O'Hara St. Louis **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of Low Grade T206 w/HOF'ers and O'Hara St. Louis **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans but please feel free to ask any questions. Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. 3 or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

I will also consider trades on the O'Hara (St. Louis).

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Camnitz - $16
Criss - $16
Doolan (fielding) - $15
Doolin (portrait) - $16
Flick (HOF) - $32
Maloney - $14
O'Hara (New York) SGC 30 - $25
O'Hara (St. Louis) SGC A - $650
Spencer - $15
Tinker (HOF) - $28
Wagner - $14
Marc, PM coming on the Doolin.  Thanks.  Mike
One bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
As always thanks so much for the deal Mark.
